dct_title_s: Johnston's war map of Zulu-land and adjoining districts with a map of the Cape Colony
dct_description_sm: Map showing Zululand, Natal, Transvaal, AmaTonga, rivers, the southernmost limit of the tsetse fly, roads, missions, forts, drifts, kraals and towns.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles."
Inset map: "Southern Africa comprising Cape Colony, Natal, &c. With Orange River Free State."
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
